[NetDynamics24](https://www.netdynamics24.com/ "NetDynamics24") is offering a **20% lifetime discount on monthly plans and 20% lifetime discount AND two months free on annual plans** off our backups storage packages.

Simply put the following code on the order form to receive your 20% discount: **LET20%**

This is **valid only until February 28, 2021** so don't miss out.

If insurance is a good idea for your Health, it's an even better idea for your server's health.
How much is peace of mind worth to you? Insure your data and sleep better at night knowing you are insured. NetDynamics24.com is offering peace of mind for **only $2.40/month**!
Server Location: Germany
Server specs: Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E3-1271 v3 @ 3.60GHz, 32 GB RAM, **Enterprise Disks**.

Plans:

(S)FTP + SSH Access + rsync
Guaranteed bandwidth: 1 GBit/s
Normal price: ~~$3/month~~. **Discounted price: $2.40/month or $24/year** ($2/month)
